Product Name: Pigeon by Stovekraft Amaze Plus Electric Kettle (14289) with Stainless Steel Body, 1.5 litre, used for boiling Water, making tea and coffee, instant noodles, soup etc. 1500 Watt (Silver)
About: About this item    CLASSIC DESIGN: The classical mirror polish of the appearance makes your electric kettle unique and aesthetic, which can match any type of kitchen design and 360° swivel base is connected with standard power cord for safe usage and convenient storage    CORDLESS POURING: The electric kettle can be easily lifts from its swivel base for easy filling at the sink and graceful serving without the hassle of a power cord; it can also be returned to its power source from any direction, great for right and left-handed users.    CONVENIENT: The cordless & BPA-Free electric electric kettle makes a striking presence on any kitchen counter or buffet in preparing and serving and it is easy for storage    FAST BOIL: This 1500W electric kettle has concealed heating elements and can boil up to 1.5 litres of water in 5 to 7 minutes, quicker and safer. Start your day with a cup of instant lemon tea, green tea, hot water.    EASY CLEAN: Use white vinegar, baking soda, water, cleaning bottle brush and microfiber cloth to clean your electric kettle and keep it looking new.    Water Level Indicator: No
Top Review:
Somehow Amazon sucks when you want to select an electric kettle. There are no options to filter your choices based on the parameters that matter. It is easy to fall into the trap of an ongoing deal and end up buying something that falls short of what you need. In this review I will answer your questions about the PIGEON AMAZE PLUS 1.5L ELECTRIC KETTLE.1. Can I trust the reviews for this ad? Are they genuine?Probably yes. But know that the seller lists several types of PIGEON Kettles in the same ad. Unless the review refers to this particular model - you could well end up seeing a review of a product and buying a different one. The ratings are also an aggregated mix. There could be 10 negative review of the product you are seeing and 10 positives for the other products. The page will show you a neutral review. That's the game sellers are playing these days - to avoid negative reviews. I have posted a picture of the stove I am referring to in this review.2. WATTAGE: Important because this tells how quickly the water will heat up. This one is 1500W - meaning that you can switch it on ... brush your teeth and find the water is boiled. Great time saving !! My earlier one was 900W and it used to take 10-15 minutes of patient waiting. The gas stove boiled water faster. This one takes about 3-4 mins to heat 2 mugs of coffee3. CABLE LENGTH: Most of these kettle makers skimp on the cable length. I have purchased kettles to find they have only a 2-foot long cable ... and I had to return them. This one has cable length of 22" (slightly more than one meter) - which is allows a comfortable distance between the kettle and the plug.4.  CONNECTOR:  This one uses a 6A plug - which is most common in India. Be careful because from >1500W onwards, most kettles use a 16A plug and that is not always available at the place where you want to place the kettle. Strictly speaking, it should have a 16A plug, but then this is kept on for short intervals only.5.  CAPACITY:  1.7 litres as mentioned - though I could not see markings for max and min levels. This is good enough to make 4-5 decent sized mugs of coffee6.  COOKING OTHER STUFF:  The ad says only water - but I see no reason why you cannot heat Maggi etc. Maybe you can. But avoid milk as the expanding effect will cause spills and this can have adverse effects.7. LOOKS: Quite okay for the price. It will not make your kitchen look bad - and neither will it enhance the looks. This is the most common look that an electric kettle can have.8. PERFORMANCE: I have used for 2 days only. No complaints so far. There is a 1-year guarantee card accompanying the product9. HANDLE: Very convenient feel when you lift it it from the heating cradle. Does not feel very heavy even if there is a full 1.7L of water.10. NEGATIVES: This is a steel jug. The outside will automatically heat up. If you are used to a plastic outside in your previous kettle, you need to be a little careful.VERDICT - "BUY"(at the time of writing this review, this costs less than Rs 700. I have seen that sellers tend to inflate prices as they get my positive reviews - therefore I am also mentioning the price range based on which I gave this product a 5 star review)

About: About this item    To Prevent Water Leakage, keep the iron horizontal when not in use, do not fill water completely, leave some gap and wait for some time for the iron to heat up before using the iron    Easy and super fast filling of the watertank,Easy and super fast emptying of the watertank,A fine spray evenly moistens the fabric; Continuous steam output up to 13 g/min,Aluminium soleplate for easy gliding on all fabrics    Warranty: 2 years on product,Power: 1440 watts ; Power Input: 240V and Frequency: 50 Hz ; Water tank capacity: 180ml ; Power cord length: 1.8m ; Calc clean solution: Self clean    Knob should always be at no steam position when product is not in use. Second and third setting is used only when soleplate is hot. Otherwise leakage will happen    Size Name: Free Size
Top Review:
Update as on 28.10.2018:*********************************The power cord has developed twists beyond repair and the seperate cores are now visible,the insulation pvc of the cores doesn't look very durable.I don't know why such standard manufacturers can't provide a decent durable cable?The iron however is performing flawlessly.Still disappointed ,as in coming weeks i'll have to change the cable for sure.Reducing one star for compromising upon the cable quality by such a big brand name.HOW IT STARTED - THE NEED FOR AN IRON:xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxRecently , my previous Bajaj make dry iron, which I received as a gift from somewhere, started giving problems after two years of occasional use & with “not so careful handling and care”. Initially, Its wires insulation inside was found rotten around the iron entry point which I repaired myself and later its thermostat started giving problems. Finally, its ON indication went OFF and I decided that it was time to bid goodbye to it and find a new one.Hence, my search for a reputed brand make , best value for money device began .Being from Electrical Engineering background & occupation, I fairly summed up my expectations from the power device as below:1.) DRY IRON VS STEAM IRON :xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxThis was fairly simple if we consider the explanation that a steam iron could perform as a dry iron but vice-versa was not possible. Also, almost always you find some or the other stubborn wrinkles and crease distortions that is hard for the dry iron to overcome and you need to use water for the purpose.On the contrary, As the steam  loosens the individual fibres of the clothes, the steam iron's pressing action smooths out wrinklesHence it was better to be  equipped with the facility in the first place in the device itself.2.) BRAND REPUTATION & WARRANTY:xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxAs an average consumer, We are not wrong in generally assuming that products of bigger established brands have a higher quality and perform better. Rightfully so ,A brand which has been working with a product for decades has a plenty of experience & research regarding the possible points of failures of the product and can be surely trusted upon.Following the same footprints I thought not to take bets upon power devices like iron and go with the Super brands like Philips having decades of expertise in this field..Our product comes with a two year global warranty which is quite decent in my opinion .3.) STEAM OUTPUT , STEAM BURST & VERTICAL STEAM FEATURE:xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxDuring normal usage with steam a delivery of anything above 8 grams/min is okay but Some ironing jobs such as curtains or quilts require a much more supply of steam. In such cases the steam burst feature comes in handy. Users can push a button to receive a burst of steam when needed. More holes in the sole plate add  to the effectiveness of steam  supplied.Vertical steam feature in theory can direct clouds of steam  in and around vertically hung garments or curtains which eliminates wrinkles without the need for a pressing force.However in practical scenario and by virtue of  its design and water tank limitations , a steam iron is virtually incapable of  addressing the wrinkles like that and  hence paying more for such a feature is not advised.Use dedicated garment steamers for that purpose.** Our Philips GC1905 comes with a variable setting for steam  output with a continuous delivery of  up to 17 grams/min which is quite good.Additionally, It can provide steam burst too for stubborn wrinkles. Vertical steam feature is not available though.4.) ELECTRICAL RELATED FEATURES: WATTAGE, CORD,THERMOSTAT etc.xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxThe simple maths that more watts means more heat or more steam or quick heating is not as simple as it looks.1. Surely, more watts means more heat generated but more wattage limits our ability to plug the iron at any socket in the house as for any power above 1500 Watts , I would suggest to only plug-in to the power sockets.Going for more power demands must be backed up with careful examination as to whether you  really need that much heating if its normal clothes only that you need to iron most of the times.2. Surely, More heat developed  is capable to deliver more steam but that depends upon the number of holes in your sole plate for it to be really effective ,Your water holding tank size and lastly steam delivery settings.Generating too much steam without delivery can be dangerous as it can pressurize the system.3. Last but not the least - More power  doesn’t always mean  quick heating as heating of the sole plate depends upon a number of factors like the material & thickness of the sole plate , Surface area of  the heating element used  inside the soleplate etc.Most of  these intricate details are variable in nature and cannot be specifically mentioned by the manufacturer.** OUR PRODUCT:# Comes with a decent 1440 Watts of power good enough for routine casual use along with occasional use on heavier fabrics.# Comes with a 250 Volts, 10 Amp ( Max. rating of plug is always extra to actual amperage) 3 pin Top which can  be easily plugged into our casual 6 amp sockets as well without any damage to the socket.Hence enhanced mobility & performance.# The cord length is around 1.8 meters which is good enough for any practical lengths,Any more than that would be cumbersome to handle.. The cord  is braided with an insulated  cotton sleeve which is useful for twists as well as insulating during a cable damage.However in due course of use, the cord often develops rigid twists & turns beneath the cotton braiding which is hard to straighten out.So not so great on the cable quality terms.# The cable only comes with 180 degrees of swivel movement, which is quite disappointing and I would  have  really wished if it was 360 degrees of cord freedom.# The thermostat knob for temperature selection comes with regular 5 settings but going with a reputed brand like Philips always assures of a good quality of thermostat.After all, the thermostat is the heart and soul of modern day irons and must be highly durable and reliable.# Lastly our product is an ISI marked product  which is quite an assurance for sure.5.) SOLEPLATE MATERIAL & SHAPE:xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxThis is probably the toughest part where each company claims to have the best and easy gliding soleplates.A variety of soleplates are available in the market today like non-stick Teflon coated ,aluminium plates with American  heritage coating, Steel plates with alloys or Ceramic coated.Each has its pros and cons.# Teflon coated plates are easy to get scratched and gather dirt over a period of time.# American Heritage is similar to Teflon and glides over the fabric even better.# Stainless steel is the most durable and easy to clean however may stick to clothes on higher settings.Adds weight to the device. Metal works better than ceramic for pressing in sharp creases on sleeves and trousers.# Good for smooth gliding and even heat distribution  but biggest advantage is to eliminate static charge at high temperatures which may cause clothes to stick.When  ironing on synthetics and fabrics blended with spandex, a ceramic iron will suit your needs best, as ceramic does not stick to these fabrics but the coating may peel off on rough handling.# Aluminium soleplates heat up quickly but are prone to damage and may stick to clothes.** Our Product comes with a linished soleplate which  is quite inadequate detail as linishing is a process of grinding or polishing a surface to make it a perfect flat.# However apart from linishing stuff, I can surely say that the soleplate in our device is decent gliding but not the best gliding, Its heavy but doesn’t stick to the clothes yet.For that matter I trusted  the brand reputation and went ahead with this linished soleplate. Stay away from Teflon coated ones though as its bound to wear off  fast.Regarding the shape , I honestly wanted  it to look like American fighter planes with sharp beak design and dark colors..LOL..However ,those models with my looks were weak in overall specs so had to settle down with this “Still-Decent Looking “model.6.) FEATURES LIKE ANTI DRIP ,ANTI-CALC, GRIP:xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxTo tell you the truth these are more of a fancy terms rather than actual purpose  for most of the users. Presence of these features, isn’t a problem  though , as in areas where the water comes hard, Anti-calc may stir and clear the calcium build up ,if any in the water tank.However ,If you use proper water, drain it out timely , Do not fully fill the tank , allow it to heat before using steam  & follow all procedures correctly, you won’t actually need to use these features.Regarding Grip ,Many iron nowadays have some unique design which is set ergonomically to give a better grip.** Our product comes with the anti-calc function  and is decent to grip though I think not ergonomically, still nothing for a deal breaker and these are minor features to discuss upon.7.) PRICE VS PERFORMANCE:xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxEven though I did not have any preset price tag in my mind  but still going over 2500 would have definitely felt extreme for a thing that I don’t make use of that much.** I bought it at a price of around 1200 bucks & for  all the features and performance it delivers - I think it is worth it.FINAL VERDICT:xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxAll in all , I would just say, that even though our product might not have the best  appealing looks or the best soleplate or  the best burst of steam or the best swivel of the cord , still, what it has is  – a complete package of all the individual features clubbed together in a decent right-performing way, which is hard to come by in an  individual model.

I recently purchased an AC from Amazon, and overall, I am quite satisfied with the product and the shopping experience. Here's a detailed review of my purchase:Ordering and Delivery:I placed the order on June 14th and received the AC on June 20th, which was within the expected delivery timeframe. The packaging was secure, and the product arrived in excellent condition.Installation:The installation process was smooth and hassle-free. On June 21st, the installation was scheduled as promised. The technicians were professional, knowledgeable, and completed the installation efficiently. I appreciate the prompt service provided by Amazon.Additional Pipe:To ensure proper installation, I decided to purchase an additional 18 ft pipe for the AC. It's worth mentioning that on Flipkart, the price was listed as ₹600 per meter, but on Amazon, they charged ₹5040 for the 18 ft pipe. It would be helpful if Amazon could provide clearer information regarding the pricing and unit measurement to avoid confusion for customers.AC Stand:I also purchased an AC stand, which cost ₹1200. It provided stability and enhanced the overall performance of the AC unit. The stand was sturdy and seemed to be of good quality.Service Charge:It is essential to note that there is an additional service charge of ₹999 plus GST for the installation. While this charge was not explicitly mentioned during the purchase, it is customary to expect such charges for professional installation services.Conclusion:Despite the additional charges for the extra pipe, AC stand, and installation service, I am satisfied with my AC purchase from Amazon. The delivery was prompt, installation was carried out efficiently, and the AC has been working flawlessly since then. However, I do believe that Amazon should provide more clarity regarding additional charges to avoid any surprises for customers during the purchase process.

Product Name: Bosch TrueMixx Pro Mixer Grinder MGM8842MIN, 1000W 4 Jars Black
About: About this item    Uniquely designed blunt PoundingBlade with thick edges which replicates pounding effect on dry ingredients, thus giving authentic texture and taste    Completely hands free operation with unique lid-locks and strong suction feet for added stability    stainless steel blades for high performance wet, dry and chutney grinding, Cable management for easy handling and storage    Concealed bush for contamination free mixing and grinding    30 minutes motor rating (5 min On and 2 min Off, maximum 6 cycles)    High grade stainless steel jars, Ergonomic design of jar handles for easy operations    Overload protector for safe operations and High grade stainless steel jars    Country of Origin: India
Top Review:
Bosch TrueMixx Pro Mixer Grinder 1000 Watt-MGM8842MIN, BlackReview:I usually do not write reviews, but I felt I had to write this one, because when I was researching which mixer to buy I found really bad reviews that do not do justice to the product. I went with the trust on Bosch brand name and am extremely satisfied with the product. I have been using it daily, sometimes multiple times in a day for past month during lockdown period. I hope this will help others.Mixer includes +capacity -1 Mixer body1 Plastic blender jar 1500ml + fruit filter,1 Wet grinding jar 1500 ml1 Dry grinding jar 1000 ml1 Chutney grinding jar 400 ml1 extra Pounding Blade1 SpatulaBuild and overall appearance1. The mixer-grinder 1000 watt motor is extremely powerful.I have used it to grind both dry & wet ingredients such asgaram masala, idli/dosa mix, Chana dal paste, Poppy seeds paste,coconut chutney, dry rice and urad dal powder, ginger garlic paste, ice, etc.I regularly blend and make milk shakes, lassis etc and have found it to very fast and convenient.2. Does the job fast within few seconds/minutes depending on the amount and type of ingredients you are working with.3. Body is good looking, sturdy, well balanced and easy to wipe clean.4. The vacuum feet are quite secure and give a true hands free experience.5. Overload protector for added safety helps if you overload the mixer by mistake.6. The jars also are easy to use and quite well-builtJars & Blades1. The jars are metal with removable stainless steel blades.2. Chutney jar blade is fixed.3. An extra blade is provided for stone pounding affect.4. A spatula cum blade changer is provided.5. The Jar lids are made of transparent plastic.6. Each lid has a small top cap which can be removed to add liquids/materials while grinding/blending.7. Each lid has rubber gaskets. This gives a completely leak proof experience while grinding/blending. These gaskets are very easy to remove and attach.8. All Jars have 4 fibre clasps to close the jars.9. In the blender jar a juicer attachment has been provided – this is the only thing I have not used, hence I cannot review the performance of this attachment.10. Blender can be used without the juicer sieve, and works fine.11. In wet blender a flow-breaker is providedSoundSound is high, but that is to be expected in a powerful 1000 watt machine.Do’s & Don’tI feel if we follow certain guidelines we can best out of the product1. Do not overload2. Do not use for more than a minute without giving a little rest.3. When turning the speed knobs – don’t turn all at once from 0 to max. You will see that it works better if you turn knobs slowly, staying at each speed for a few seconds. Actually for most things  low to medium speed is enough. The machine is really powerful.4. When grinding large amount of ingredients the jar can heat up ( not the machine) so give a little rest in between.5. For wet grinding – use cold water to grind – that way the jar will never heat up.6. DO NOT grind hot ingredients. Many people have complained about the rubber gaskets melting – that can only have happened if hot food are being blended or ground. Bring food to room temp and then grind.7. Wash the jar, gasket, jars immediately using a sponge and liquid detergent so that the shine of the jar remains intact.8. Always remove and wash the gasket to avoid unhygienic conditions as food can get under the gaskets.9. In the wet blender remove the flow breaker by sliding it off and wash it separately as food particles can get stuck behind it.10. To remove fine particles when dry grinding don’t use a spoon to avoid scratches to the jar. You can use your hand and a brush ( used for this purpose only).11. This is an expensive piece of equipment – In my house only I & my husband use it. We do not allow  children or household help/cooks to use it. This way the machine will not be misused.12. If you mixer does not work  – please check the overload protector button on the underside of the machine. Remove some of the ingredients and try again.13. Take care while handling jar lids and lid tops – Although they appear quite well made, I cannot say if they will break when dropped.Pros1. The machine is very powerful and delivers what it promises2. It is easy to use and gives truly hands free experience3. Easy to clean4. Grinds and blends everything5. Leak-proof lids.6. Takes very little time to grind7. The motor does not heat up even easily8. The overload protector works perfectlyCons1. Guarantee & Manual - The Manual has to be downloaded from the Amazon websiteThe Amazon payment is the guarantee. There is no separate guarantee card provided. I had to call Amazon to understand the situation regarding the guarantee card.2. Delivery - The mixer-grinder came in a box but there was no special Styrofoam padding. This was a big minus for me.3. A couple of extra lid clasps should be provided – one of my lid clasps was loose, it is working fine at the moment, but as a backup company should provide these.4. As the jars are pretty large, for smaller amount of products it is a little difficult. I wish the smallest chutney jar was usable for both dry & wet grinding rather than only wet.5. The jars do have screws heads on the inner side – but this is not a big deal – and can be cleaned quite easily.

Top Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                



 So I have kind of a mixed feeling about it.Do keep in mind that this is one of the cheapest full size cooler out there from a known brand.Coming to the review, I'll simply divide it to 2 category.1. QualityFirst of all it's very light weight (when there's no water😛). The body is completely made of (cheap)plastic which to me is good as its easy to handle and since there are no kids to toss it around it will last quite a while(no rust). I got the snow white colour one which looks decent. There are 4 coaster wheels(without lock) also made of plastic which I doubt if it will last, but still it gets the job done. There is 3 honeycomb cooling pads which is another plus to me as I hate the fiber/wood wool type. There is no remote though. The cable is long enough but it's not grounded(2 pin type). The worst part is the water inlet hole. I don't know who's the genius who designed it but he simply messed it up. It's a fixed opening which is neither wide or long enough to pour the water comfortably without spilling any. Don't even think of putting ice cubes as it simply won't go in as it is.2. PerformanceNow I bought this cooler for 2 primary reason. 1 it's cheap, 2 the power consumption is remarkably low. This consumes 80W. The air is pushed out by a high speed 2500rpm 50W fan(not a blower). And there's a pump on the bottom that pumps water up to the cooling pads. Couldn't see the power consumption of the pump but it should be somewhere around 15-20W. There another motor for the swing(left and right) and I assume it's 4-5W (up and down is manual). I know the math doesn't add up 😌. Just to give you an idea, an average air cooler consumes around 120W to 180W. The air throw is strong but narrow even with the swing. Which means this is more of a "personal air cooler". Suitable for 1 or max 2 people in a small room. Ooh I almost forgot, this thing is loud by all means even at the slowest speed(fan leaf is also plastic). Do not buy if you have a baby in room. Full tank of water lasts for about 16 hours if cooling pads are clean(if cooling pads get dusty, water will last more than twice). There is a water level indicator in the front(it's the transparent line type, not the float and needle type).ControlsFan speed is controlled by a knob with 3 speed. Off, high, medium and low in the respective order. There's 4 setting for swing and water pump together with another knob 1 swing and pump OFF, 2 swing ON pump OFF, 3 swing and pump ON, 4 swing OFF pump ON in respective order(check the video to get a better idea).Pros1. price2. Very Low power consumption3. Light weight plastic4. Strong air throw5. Coaster wheels6. 24L capacity7. Honeycomb cooling pads8. No rattling or vibrationCons1. Noisy(mainly coz of plastic fan leaf)2. Made of cheap plastic3. Tiny water inlet hole4. No ice chamber5. Narrow air throw even with swing6. No electrical grounding.In conclusion I would say it's worth the price. Also check out it's bigger brother the "Bajaj PX97". The only difference is that it has a larger water tank capacity and a bigger 80W fan motor.General Facts1. Coolers has to be used in a well ventilated room. If used in a closed room, humidity will increase and you will feel hotter and sticky.2. I prefer to fill the cooler tank half way every night so the water stays fresh and chilled.3. Clean the cooling pads every month or so avoids any possible odour.4. Most importantly, if you are living in a coastal area or if your area is generally very humid, please don't consider buying any cooler, it will not work as expected, only way is to buy an AC.If you have any more questions please feel free to contact me through Instagram (from my profile).Do vote if you found this review"helpful". ✌🤘

Whether you need to grind spices, blend ingredients, or prepare chutneys, this mixer grinder delivers exceptional results. With its durability, functionality, and user-friendly features, the Prestige IRIS Plus mixer grinder has become an indispensable asset in my kitchen.

Top Review:
The Cookwell Bullet Grinder is a compact and versatile kitchen appliance that promises to make your grinding and blending tasks a breeze. As an avid cook and someone who appreciates the convenience of modern kitchen gadgets, I recently had the opportunity to try out this bullet grinder, and here's my review based on my experience.Design and Build Quality:The Cookwell Bullet Grinder features a sleek and sturdy design. It comes with a powerful motor encased in a durable stainless steel body, giving it a premium look and feel. The compact size makes it ideal for small kitchens or for those who prefer not to clutter their countertop space.Performance:When it comes to performance, the Cookwell Bullet Grinder truly delivers. It comes with different-sized jars and blades that allow for various grinding and blending tasks. I found it to be particularly efficient in grinding spices, nuts, and coffee beans. The motor is powerful enough to handle tough ingredients with ease, ensuring a smooth and consistent result every time.One of the standout features of this grinder is its speed options. It offers multiple speed settings, allowing you to adjust the grinding process based on your specific needs. Whether you want a coarse grind or a fine powder, the Cookwell Bullet Grinder gives you the flexibility to achieve your desired texture.Ease of Use:Using the Cookwell Bullet Grinder is straightforward and user-friendly. The jars and blades are easy to assemble and disassemble, making it convenient to clean after use. The one-touch operation simplifies the grinding process, and the jars are designed with clear markings for measuring ingredients accurately.Noise Level:One minor drawback of the Cookwell Bullet Grinder is its noise level. The motor can be a bit loud, especially when grinding harder ingredients. It's not a deal-breaker, but it's something to keep in mind, especially if you have a sensitivity to noise or if you prefer quieter kitchen appliances.Versatility:The Cookwell Bullet Grinder is a versatile appliance that goes beyond just grinding. It can also be used for blending smoothies, making purees, and even chopping vegetables. The different jars and blades cater to various needs, allowing you to experiment and expand your culinary repertoire.Value for Money:Considering its performance, durability, and versatility, the Cookwell Bullet Grinder offers good value for money. It is priced competitively compared to similar products on the market, and its durability ensures that it will last for a long time with proper care.Overall, I am pleased with my experience using the Cookwell Bullet Grinder. It delivers on its promises, providing efficient grinding and blending capabilities in a compact and user-friendly package. While it can be a bit noisy, its versatility and durability make it a worthwhile investment for any kitchen. If you're in need of a reliable and efficient grinder, the Cookwell Bullet Grinder is definitely worth considering.

Top Review:
This Ac is very good if outside temperature is under 35 degree maximum in overall day. In west bengal currently in MAY daily routine temperature  is like 40-42 degree(i believe Celling temp is about 45+ degree, as direct sunlight heats up ceiling continuously whole day), my room is 140sqft, My 1.5 ton 5 star ac 2023 struggles to reach less than 25 degree using VIRAAT mode in terms of overall temp in room in extreme hot weather. It consumes  about using viraat 1.4+ unit/hour while it consumes 1.4KW to 1.57KW for under 35 degree ( upto 1.75 KW for extreme hot and compressor is exposed to direct sunlight) for initializing cooling and about  0.45 unit/hour using 40% mode in these hot day time which runs on 500 watt ( It gives 28 degree cooling). At night after 12:00 PM. 40% mode consumes about 0.2-0.3 unit/hour temp ( provides me around 25-26 degree with 270w to 320 watt power consumption as it utilizes inverter function if daytime is extremely hot in general) depending on allocated temperature generally i set 25 degree while outside temperature is 28 degree. I managed to get 24 drgree for using 40% in normal weather at night. So, this ac will be good for ground floor bedroom(upto 150 sqft) or top floor( which is less than 120 sqft) ..For extreme hot condition it works decently only on VIRAAT mode. I think for such case DAIKIN,PANASONIC,HITACHI,SAMSUNG AC or LG (4 star model 2023/5 star 2022 model) will be better option which have greater cooling capacity eual or more than 5000watt at 100% capacity( where LG provides 4600watt cooling capacity which is actually equivalent to 1.31 Ton which can be extended upto 5400 watt using VIRAAT/110% mode =1.52 ton). Only low power consumption under 35 degree,Vey Low noise level,strong build quality, good services and decent cooling at VIRAAT mode(At Extreme Hot) can be expected from LG. Best way to get proper benifits in energy consumption is that i play 20-30 minutes on VIRAAT mode, then I use 100% mode at auto fan speed at 24 degree. It will use 0.7-0.9 unit/hour if outside temperature is under 32-35 degree. Auto fan speed is very good option after achieving 25 degree as it cools efficiently and it is same for longtime usages.I learned from my experience1) I should have suggested to the service engineer to install outside unit at the shady part of Rooftop/ above the window shades toward North or East direction. But they installed outside unit above rooftop toward west direction, where AC ambient temperature is much higher  for direct sunlight after 10:00 AM.2) Place AC indoor unit at the suitable spot of your bedroom/work room from where you can access  properly the air blow. I made a mistake fitting it above of my BED , that's why i can't get proper feel of cold air while i am on the bed as its rotation of up-down flipping is around 60 degree downward from horizontal level as you can see on the picture which is the minimum you can set from remote/ app. But sad part is that normally  it flips for once around 85 degree when swing mode is started. So personally I  adjust manually flip by hand sometimes.3) Definitely i should have gone for other brand for better cooling as i have mentioned already according to top floor room. Convertable mode is not so useful for INVERTER ac if you manually control the temperature. Your electricity power consumption depends on the temperature you have set,room temperature and outside temperature. If the saturation point/targeted temperature is achieved easily/fast, you will be sure that power consumption would be much lesser. You can use smart Plug for monitoring exact power consumption for non wifi model which costs less than 1k.4) Try offline dealer/store for once, you may get it at cheaper price and extra warranty benefits for some specific brands. I bought this unit at ₹47300 after EMI discount on credit card from amazon.5) I followed some youtube videos where LG installation engineers are doing important "VACCUME process" for longevity of R32 gas and "air leaking test". But for my case they haven't done either of these, they told me that these were not necessary for new ac!! I don't know which is authentic..So, you should confirm when they will call you for installation.Rest of all, my installation charge is around ₹2860 included 1415(basic installation charge)+ 885( outside stand)+560( 20 ft draining pipe).6) Everyone suggests to buy a stabilizer. I haven't bought it, it can handle from 120 volt to 285 volt. I went to Lg website and searched this product, they have mentioned there that no stabilizer is needed. However, I don't face any power fluctuation problem in my Locality, so i didn't think of it. You can consider a stabilizer as a future proof.LATER EXPERIENCE>> After a tons of research, recently i have insulated properly bottom & side of the door and windows using door insulationstrip and single sided foam tape available online. I am surprise that it has improved 15%-20% more efficiency.room gets cool at faster rate.Initially i ignored those tiny gaps, as it was not noticable. As a conclusion proper air sealing will definitely improve AC's efficiency.

Summer and air cooler goes synonymously, especially when you do not want AC and are trying to avoid it.Upon subsequent analysis wrt price point, features and utility wrt room size this model emerged on top, from among similar range products from other companies.•••••••••••••••••••••🎁 INSIDE BOX•••••••••••••••••••••▶ Cooler▶ Manual▶ Warranty Card•••••••••••••➕ PROS•••••••••••••1. Good looking, lightweight & portable2. 4 castor wheels to make it portable (wheels are actually smooth)3. Effective cooling for room size of 20x15ft.4. Honeycomb type cooling pads on three sides for effective cooling.5. Good capacity (75l) water tank. Single fill lasts for full 14-18 hours of continuous usage.6. Auto swing (R-L) ensures uniform cooling of room7. Full plastic body means no issue like in all metal desert coolers, which rust after a while and start leaking at times.8. Direct transparent zone to act as water level indicator to let you know when tank is empty. No mechanical components here.9. Sufficiently long cable, approx. 1.5 metre. For more you require extension cord.••••••••••••••➖ CONS••••••••••••••1. Installed honeycomb type pads are difficult to find. You need to settle for normal grass pads later on when these are clogged.2. Water inlet lid is difficult to open (mostly a manufacturing defect in this piece). Initially we thought that we would break it while opening, it was that hard to pull3. Gimmicy ice chamber and you would better use lower water inlet to put in ice to cool water instantly. If you use ice chamber, icethe process of cooling water is very slow- ice melts and cold water flows down the pipe to the tank.4. Noise levels are higher but that is due to higher air flow to cover bigger spaces and sadly you can't avoid it. If you go for bigger coolers, you would have slightly higher noise levels.For the cons, I am deducting 1 star. 4 stars as the product fulfils its purpose in best possible way with some scope for improvement in other domains.•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••🎛️ KNOB CONTROLS•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••Knob 1:Controls speed, 3 speeds to haveKnob 2: Controls autoswing and water pump- water pump on and swing off, water pump on and swing on, pump off and swing on, both off•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••🎛️ AIR DIRECTION CONTROL•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••Horizontal Blades: No auto swing, manual adjustment (hard to adjust)Vertical Blades: Auto swing, knob control, all blades move simultaneouslySo in practice you can have air directed either up or down or front, with auto swing of vertical blades covering all zones as per manually set horizontal blades.••••••••••••⚙️ TIPS••••••••••••1. Install cooler near window or door so that it can pump in some of fresh air from outside to have a control over humidity.2. Better if you can install it in balcony, facing window such that its 3 sides are able to suck in fresh air. Cover rest of window with cardboard or thermocole sheets for better insulation. It helps control humidity in room, as if it’s inside a closed room, it continuously adds moisture.3. Cross ventilation doubles the cooling effect. So if cooler on one corner, provide air escape route on other corner.3. Use ice cool water for faster cooling. You can manually add ice to it.4. Clean cooler once or twice a week. It ensures long life of cooler and hygiene too. Or it may soon become prominent breeding place for mosquitoes.5. Do have an eye on air quality. If theres lot of water droplets along with air, get it checked or it may cost you coolers motor in long run, as it may burn.6. END OF SEASON TIP: To ensure long life of cooler, completely clean and dry it before storage. Then add few drops of oil to shaft of motor and store it. This way your cooler will be ready to cool upon unpack from last season or else you may end up your cooler in repair shop.•••••••••••••••••••••••••🏆 FINAL VERDICT•••••••••••••••••••••••••Not a bad deal for the price and performance. You don’t find many coolers with such water capacity.

While this filter has some positive aspects, there are a few drawbacks worth mentioning.Starting with the positives, the water purifier came at an economical price point, making it an attractive choice for budget-conscious consumers. The product description mentioned RO+UV, but the box stated only RO filtration.In conclusion, the water filter offers an economical option for those seeking basic filtration. Top Review:
Once you start using a bagless vacuum cleaner, you will never turn back (using it on a weekly basis since Nov 2021, so its a long tern review). Coming from another vacuum cleaner that had bags, this one is truly a hassle-free cleaner, at least you are away from the hassle of maintaining/cleaning/replacing bags which is truly a mess, and you would understand only if you have used cleaners with bags. Further, devices with bags tend to get chocked now and then, leading to less suction.•••••••••••••••••••🎁 INSIDE BOX•••••••••••••••••••1. Vacuum cleaner unit2. Flexible pipe with integrated retraceable brush and suction adjustment knob3. Turbo brush nozzle4. Multi-clean nozzle5. High suction flat inlet nozzle6. Telescopic extension pipe7. User manual8. Warranty cardThe power cord is ~6mtr and device comes with a mechanish to retrace it back into the machine. It has normal 16 amp 2 pin top which can easily fit in 3 or 5-pin sockets (both 5/6 amp or 15/16amp), but better to connect it to 15/16 amp ones only considering its power consumption.•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••➕ OBSERVATIONS & PROS•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••1. Device has high suction power and can be cleaned easily with a bagless design where dust collects in a chamber, and you can empty it in the dustbin—no hassles of cleaning and replacing bags.2. Components are high quality, such as the telescopic extension is metallic, though it's also a con for this attachment. Even plastic components are of good quality.3. Device easily moves around owing to its big and smooth wheels. You don't need to pull it by force.4. Default flexible pipe itself is long and has an integrated brush that can also be retracted. Its a highly useful attachment considering it's attached to a primary flexible pipe and is easily available for use.5. Each attachment here is multipurpose. When you open the package, you feel like very few attachments are provided, but when you start exploring, you discover that all attachments are multipurpose. (details below)6. Attachments are easy snap fit and remove (ActiveLock in the company's terminology). Once you insert the attachments, it click locks and can be removed by a press of a button or release lever.7. Both the turbo brush and multi-nozzle have flexible neck and wheels on the bottom for easy movement and effective cleaning8. Dust collector can be opened with one press and has removable filters attached to it. These filters can be washed once in a while to prevent clogging.9. the Main unit has H13 filter system to filter fine dust, dust mites, etc., and is equivalent to HEPA 13, as per the company. This filter is accessible from the backside for cleaning purposes.10. Device obviously makes sound but is not in the range of causing irritation to the ears. It's in the bearable range.•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••➖ OBSERVATIONS & CONS•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••1. Telescopic extension is metallic and heavy. So, it's a bit of trouble to use for longer durations, especially when you are trying to clean ceilings.2. Reduction of suction power is via a bypass valve built into the flexible pipe and has no way to reduce the power of the machine to reduce suction. So effectively, this valve makes cleaner suck in air from in between to reduce suction at the end, but then consumes the same amount of power. If there had been a control mechanism to reduce power, it would also save electricity.3. Device comes with a 16amp top but its 2-pin, so if you are going to use it with modular power sockets with self closing mechanism for holes, it will be a trouble to plug it in everytime.4. I miss the blower system in this cleaner, which is handy at times (was there in my previous cleaner). They could have easily implemented it.For the cons reducing 1 star, but its definitely a 4-star device.•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••🔧 Attachments•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••- Flexbile pipe comes with an integrated brush, and you can easily retract it back onto the pipe- Multipurpose nozzle has a button to increase its suction power, and with one press, it goes nearer to the floor- Turbo brush nozzle sweeps the floor or mattress with rotating bristles along the length, and if you want to turn off the rotation of the brush, there is a button to lock it- Main unit has a system on the back and botton side to attach the multi-clean and turbo brush nozzle primarily for easy sweep or for storage purposes•••••••••••••••••••••••🏆 FINAL VERDICT•••••••••••••••••••••••This bagless vacuum cleaner is a hassle-free device and requires very less maintenance but it comes at a cost, and if you are willing to stretch your budget, it's definitely worth it. I have had no any issues so far in the past 1 year, when using it regularly.

Operating the pressure washer is also a breeze, thanks to its intuitive controls.3. Foam Dispenser: While the pressure washer excels in many aspects, the foam dispenser is an area that could use improvement. The foam dispenser, unfortunately, falls short of my expectations. It doesn't generate as much foam as I had hoped.The foam dispenser on this pressure washer has a major issue—it doesn't firmly attach to the pressure gun. As a result, it rotates during use, making it difficult to apply foam accurately to the desired target area. This limitation significantly affects the usability of the pressure washer, particularly for those who rely on foam application for cleaning tasks. An upgrade to the foam dispenser would greatly enhance the overall functionality of this pressure washer.4. Water Usage: One aspect to keep in mind is that this pressure washer tends to consume a relatively higher amount of water. While it delivers impressive cleaning power, the increased water usage might be a concern for those conscious about conserving water. However, if you have access to an ample water supply, this might not be a significant drawback.In conclusion, this pressure washer is a reliable and effective tool for tackling various cleaning tasks. Its strong water pressure, combined with its ease of installation and operation, make it a valuable asset for outdoor cleaning projects. Though the foam dispenser could be improved, it doesn't diminish the overall performance of the pressure washer. If you don't mind the higher water usage, this pressure washer is a worthwhile investment for keeping your outdoor spaces clean and well-maintained.

Had to buy a starch spray to even out the creases from my linen clothing.2) Would not recommend for bigger households having a ton of laundry as the electricity consumed is higher than other products of similar price range.3) Heavy weight of the iron might be a hassle for some, so do consider the weight aspect of this iron.All in all, we are happy with the product and would recommend it for a small working household like ours where ironing needs to be quick and efficient!

Product Name: LG 7 Kg 5 Star Semi-Automatic Top Loading Washing Machine (P7020NGAZ, Dark Gray, Wind Jet Dry)
About: About this item    Semi-automatic washing Machine: Economical, Low water and energy consumption, involves manual effort; Has both washing and drying functions    Capacity 7.0 kg (wash): Suitable for families with 3 to 4 members    5 Star: Best in class efficiency    Manufacturer Warranty: 2 Years Comprehensive & 5 years on Motor T&C    1300 RPM: higher spin speeds helps in faster drying
Top Review:
PRODUCTLG 7 Kg 5 Star Semi-Automatic Top Loading Washing Machine (P7020NGAZ, Dark Gray, Wind Jet Dry)Delivery date: Oct 23, 2022Purchase cost: Rs.11,490REVIEWThe unit was delivered with the statement that it is 'ready to use' with 'no installation required'. The statement is not fully correct. For people with no familiarity whatsoever with units such as this, assembly of the inlet and outlet pipes and fitting of the lint filter and other accessories can be a little challenging. I had especial problems with the plumbing because I had to purchases a brass adaptor/connector with clamp so that the washing machine inlet pipe could be connected to the wall water supply.[Note: It is not essential to have an inlet pipe for water supply. Water can be poured from a bucket into the wash tub.]The instruction manual and accompanying pamphlet were in print that was so small that I required a magnifying glass to read it and to view details in the figures. The explanations provided were insufficiently clear to understand the purpose and use of all the knobs and settings on the control panel.Assuredly, it's not rocket science, especially to people who have used washing machines before. However, I needed to view youtube videos and use a mixture of guesswork and commonsense at the time of first use. Now, of course, after a trial load of clothes, I am comfortable and happy with the appliance. The wash function, the rinse and spin function, and the spin dry function work smoothly and well. Noise is not excessive. The buzzer to signal the end of the wash cycle is loud. The plastic cover that protects the appliance from falling water from a nearby shower is useful.Because the wash tub is wide, more water is required for the water level to be above the clothes level, and hence more detergent is required for the water to be soapy. So, it is not efficient to use the washing machine with small loads of washing.The wash tub can also be used for rinsing.Moving clothes from the wash tub to the spin dry tub is a small price to pay for the lower cost of a semiautomatic device. However, because the spin dry tub is much smaller than the wash tub, if the quantity of washing is large, one load of washing may need spin drying in 2 or more loads.For users who have a terrace or balcony to dry clothes, the spin dry function is unnecessary (except during the rainy season).With a fully automatic washing machine, the user wastes no time at the machine after loading the clothes, adding the detergent, and keying in the wash settings. With this semiautomatic machine, the user needs to spend additional time in filling and turning off the water for washing; afterwards, in draining and filling water, again, for one or more cycles of rinsing; and afterwards, for one or more cycles of transferring clothes from wash to spin tubs for drying. Busy people might prefer to buy a fully automatic machine.Other notes:1. There are no wheels, but this is not a problem because the machine is reasonably light and can be moved without much difficulty.2. The power cord is only about 2 m long and starts from near the base of the machine, so it needs to be installed close to the wall power point.3. The drain pipe is only about 1.5 m long, so the machine needs to be installed close to where the water can drain.LG should provide more detailed manuals and in larger print, or at least make these available online for download and reference, along with making short videos available at their website for different aspects of assembly, installation, and use.

Preethi Zodiac MG 218 750-Watt Mixer Grinder (Black/Light Grey)It's a real looker..So I really wanted to replace my old mixer (Preethi Blue Leaf) and I was keeping an eye for this product for the past 6 months at least. Finally I bought it. First impression was AWESOME!! It looks really good.It was individually well wrapped on plastic bag and kept in a cardboard hosting. I am pretty sure that it was meant to protect it while shipping.So I started unwrap the bag and tried to assemble the jars and the bottom assembly (motor), I find that the jars are kind of dirty with some dust and smells like a 'factory' (probably it might have picked up from the manufacturing facility). So first thing first, I washed them individually using soapy warm water by hand and then rinse it with the motor running on normal water and everything was cleared and no foul smell. (I believe that Preethi should have taken care of this from their manufacturing facility itself) Not a deal breaker.Bottom Assembly (Motor Casing)***************************************It has a wide bottom and meant for stability with rubber holder (esp. while kneading atta using Master Chef jar), which does  it's job. Comparing to the Blue Leaf I had before, the air went is at the bottom (Good thing) so that if the jar is over flowing/leaking during grinding water seeping into the motor is minimal.It has two light indicator, one at the speed knob and other just below that, it lights Blue. It runs relatively quiet compares to Blue Leaf. (Good thing)I kind of felt that the knob is cheap. It is wobbly and it is not sturdy as Preethi Blue Leaf. It is the frequently used thing on the mixer and I don't know why Preethi would go for a cheap looking/feeling wobble speed knob. It was just a turn off for the whole product. I saw that my product was manufactured on March 2017 as per the box (This product was released on April 2016 as per Amazon) and they haven't fixed/noticed it (Very Bad).Motor coupler looks not really strong either. (If you're wondering what motor coupler is, it's the small white rotating thing that drives the jar). It just got four teeth and I kind of have a feeling that it will broke, if you run it with a heavy load (grinding turmeric/whole wheat) (Very Bad). Blue Leaf had 6 teeth on it's coupler. I will update the review if the coupler is broken.Rating: 2/5Master Chef Jar*******************This is one the jar that was advertised heavily on this mixer.Well, Is it gonna replace your food processor? Read on.Mater Chef jar comes with it's own set of accessories.Grating and slicing bladeBeater and chopping bladeCitrus juice extractor.It was marked up to 1500ML as the maximum volume. However, if you run this with 500ML water, it just over flows! So the actual liquid volume is little over 400ML, when you run the jar with liquid in it, it just climbs the side and over flows.. So watch out. (Bad)The slicing blade came with just one size. How you're going to make thick/thin slices with just one blade? (Bad) I am not sure if there are different size blades available for purchase separately, if yes, please put that in the comment section below.Preethi ships just the grating/slicing blade where you can attach to a disc. The scary part is that I almost cut myself while trying to change the blade. You really need to watch out while changing the blade.(Horrible Design Flaw)There is a gear assembly on the Master Chef jar to reduce the torque (rotating speed) on this jar. And the gear assembly is poorly designed (how???), It just create a very loud uncomfortable noise. It is really loud that I hate to use the whole jar.. What a bummer!!So to answer the first question. Will this replace your food processor?? Hell NO!!Rating: 3/5Juicer Jar***********The 3-in-1 Insta Fresh Fruit Juicer Jar is another hyped jar. It comes with two sets of blade and a pusher. It really extract juices out of apples, Grapes, pomegranate etc really well. You can use the spout to extract the juice instantly or you can draw it from the jar itself. (Good thing)Cleaning can be a daunting task as it got several parts. So I try to use only when I need to use this for larger quantities or when some special occasions.Other Jars************It got other three Stainless Steel jars. (Big, Medium and Small). I just love them. They looks really good and build perfectly. I really like the small jar (Chutney Jar), which now got a handle! (Really Good thing)Rating: 5/5Conclusion:**************This mixer is not dish washer friendly, which means that you need to hand wash this everytime. Juice extract jar will be a pain to use as it got too many little stuffs to clean. Come on Preethi, it's 2017.. You need to start making products that are compatible with a dish washer.Do I still recommend this product? Yes, only if you're looking for a good mixer grinder, with multi-functions.But if you already have a food processor or you have Preethi Blue Leaf or anything similar, then don't upgrade to Zodiac, it is not worth it and you may not be able to get the real value for money out of it.Overall Rating: 3/5---------------------------Edit: 1Please don't get me wrong. Though I have rated this mixer 3/5, it is still one of the best mixer that you can get in the market.It has a very powerful motor. The 3 grinding jars are second to none.Master Chef jar work flawlessly for slicing/grating (I just complained about not been able to adjust the grating/slicing sizes and it's design)Juicer works perfect. If you're health conscious and you drink lot of veg/fruit juices, you will reclaim this investment within 6 months!!If you're from South India, then you can find the service center for Preethi in almost every city/town. (I'm really not sure about the rest of India. I saw couple of comments saying that there is no service center in N. India. Please check the available Service Center for your city/town on Preethi website and just give them a ring, before you click Add to Cart, just to make sure they are there!!)Edit 2:My observation about the Motor coupler (white cap thing that drives the jar blades) was right... Finally it really broke down.. Luckily I was able to get it fixed by the authorized repair outlet in Chennai before the second lockdown!!You wouldn't believe how much it costs me to fix it... Rs. 17!! yeah... I gave them Rs. 20 note and he even gave my change!!I am increasing the star to 4, just for the splendid after sales service of Preeti after 4 years!!

   Key Feature: Twin Cooling Plus - Ensure your food stays fresh for longer, Movable Twist Ice Maker, Anti-Bacterial Gasket, R600A Refrigerant, Runs on Solar energy, Runs on Home Inverter, Stylish Recess Door Handle Number of Fridge Shelves - 3 | Number of Fridge Door Pocket - 4 | Number of Vegetable & Fruit Drawer - 1 | Number of Freezer Shelves - 1 | Number of Freezer Door Pocket – 2 Included in the box: 1 Refrigerator Unit, Ice Maker Box, Egg Tray, User Manual, Warranty Card   Show More
Top Review:
Research is a most important aspect while investing a big amount. I researched well, compared it with other models, both online and in stores, and finally came upon conclusion to buy it. You get nice set of features, including large space, removable ice tray, control panel on the outside, convertible modes, power freeze, power cool etc. Review is after approx 1.5 years of usage.🎁 INSIDE BOX•••••••••••••••••••1x refrigerator1x ice tray4x glass shelves1x vegetable box1x User manual➕ PROS••••••••••••1. Works silently and is a 3 star device. So expect power consumption as per 3 star BEE rating. It hasn't impacted my electricity bills much.2. You get plenty of storage, with 3 glass shelves, one glass shelf/lid for vegetable container, some pockets for bottles and other items along with 2 dedicated egg baskets on door, etc.3. It has a door alarm which is a wonderful feature in my opinion. It reminds us if door is left open for more than 2 minutes. Especially when we miss to close it completely or left open accidentally (happens quite a lot).4. Movable ice maker to adjust space as per desire, or to remove it completely if not needed5. Convertible mode may prove helpful to many, for energy saving or customizing compartments on need basis. Like when on vacation, you could switch off refrigerator if nothings left, and keep only freezer on, or when only a single member at home, use freezer as mini refrigerator and switch off bigger refrigerator if  you have nothing to freeze.➖ CONS••••••••••••1. I personally feel that LED position is a bit off and should have been on the back, or both top and lower back. If fridge is full then with the current arrangement, light won't reach the bottom zones. Those zones are dark and make it difficult to find items there.2. I would prefer light in the freezer as well (not we have cool LED lights available, as opposed to previous gen warm bulbs), but then its something which every manufacturer avoids, considering minimal utility (#of opening refrigerator door vs freezer).Here the cons are personal preferences/observations and not something which are product issues per se.☑ FEATURES & OPERATION•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••1. Convertible mode include 5 combos (upper compartment + lower compartment):Freezer + RefrigeratorRefrigerator + RefrigeratorFreezer off + RefrigeratorFreezer + Refrigerator offFreezer acting as refrigerator + refrigerator off2. Left button is used to set freezer temperature (-23°C to -19°C)3. Right button is used to set refrigerator temperature (1°C to 7°C) and to set it to vacation mode (off)4. Middle button is used to toggle freezer (on/refrigerator mode/off)5. Power freeze (press left button for 3 sec)6. Power cool (press right button for 3 sec)❔ WHY DOUBLE DOOR•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••Double door works good, but comes with a cost. With single door & same capacity you get more space & generally in normal household we dont have many items to be kept in upper ice zone. So that space is kind of wasted.But still its better to settle for double door if cost is not a constraint, as it better organizes content & is efficient. For e.g. if you want ice, you dont need to expose everything to outer environment, which increases temperature & thereby increases load on compressor. Just open upper freezer door and have your ice.Other reason to get double door is it works on forced convection with fans installed for cold air circulation, instead of natural forced convection in single door. In my view its far more efficient for uniform cooling inside. Also, it eliminates need for defrosting freezer chamber (frosting still happens in single door models).✍ FINAL VERDICT••••••••••••••••••••••••It is a recommended product for the capacity and useful features (not the gimmicks).

About: About this item    For Inverter AC up to 1.5 Ton: iMagno 410 AC stabilizer for 1.5 ton inverter AC is specifically designed to support inverter AC units with a capacity of up to 1.5 tons. Whether you have a compact inverter AC or a larger one, this stabilizer provides the ideal power supply to keep your AC functioning at its best.    EMI Filter Protection: iMagno 410 has an EMI filter that helps to suppress electromagnetic waves and safeguard connected devices. This can help to protect your AC from damage caused by power surges and electrical abnormalities.    Initial Time Delay System: iMagno 410 AC stabilizer features an initial time delay system that protects and extends the life of your AC's compressor. By providing a gradual power supply during start-up, it reduces stress on the compressor, minimizing wear and tear, and enhancing its lifespan.    High and Low Voltage Cut Off: Voltage fluctuations can be detrimental to the performance and longevity of your AC. iMagno 410 offers high and low voltage cut off functionality, automatically disconnecting the power supply when voltage levels exceed or drop below safe thresholds. Micro-controlled Operation for Smart Output Voltage Correction: The stabilizer uses a micro-controlled based design circuitry to constantly monitor the input voltage and adjust the output voltage, Accordingly, ensuring that your AC always receives a stable and consistent power supply, even if the input voltage fluctuates.

As a tower fan it is quite decent and has enough power. It has a filter too. For those who require more air than filteration can probably remove the filter for more air flow.  As for cooler, don’t expect it to be an air conditioner. It has a tiny water pump that circulates cool water to get the air tad bit cooler. It ships with 4 mini plastic bottles that you can use to freeze some water or liquid of your choice. But I’ve noticed it doesn’t freeze completely into a block of ice. And the material itself doesn’t conduct properly to transfer the coolness into the water. You can get larger gel packs for better effect. But still don’t expect a miracle. Max 1-2*C lower than room temp.

The media could not be loaded.
                



 If you’re a FOODIE, then you surely love exploring new recipes on Youtube or on any blogging websites online. When it comes to cooking that recipe, to get that exact taste and texture, you need a good sense of PRECISION about how much of the ingredient is too much. With a handy digital KITCHEN SCALE at your disposal, you can skip the guesswork and weigh your ingredients precisely.A great kitchen scale should be PRECISE in its measurements but also EASY TO CLEAN, simple to read, and suitable to store (if necessary). As for HEALTHY eaters, a kitchen weighing scale helps to measure healthy portion size of foods so that you don’t overeat your carbs, proteins and fats. In short, a precise and a high-accuracy kitchen scale can make you a BETTER COOK and help with your diet and WEIGHT MANAGEMENT. This Dr Trust's Electronic Kitchen Scale machines EXCELS in doing all this and more!First of all, it has ACCU GAUGE SENSORS and hence, the scale can precisely weigh from 1 gram up to 5000 grams. It has maximum GRADUATION increment of 1 gram or say 0.1 oz. It can display measurements in grams (g), milliliter (ml), pounds (lb) and ounces (oz).Secondly, the INTERFACE of the scale is simple and straightforward; with TWO BUTTONS: one turns the scale on/off and tares, another lets you adjust the UNIT of the measurements. Machine is dull BLUE in color and is made of some high-quality material which makes it DURABLE enough for daily use in the kitchen or elsewhere. It has a wide LCD screen (46mm x 22mm and white back-light) which makes it easy to read the measurements while the TOUCH SENSITIVE BUTTONS make the scale easy to operate.Thirdly, this Dr Trust Kitchen Scale has TARE option to weigh DIFFERENT ingredients in the SAME CONTAINER. It allows the user to RESET THE WEIGHT as ingredients are added one after another without having to remove the previous ingredient(s). It also allows the user to cancel out the weight of the container in which the ingredients will be measured. In my VIDEO with this review, I have explained how to use the tare function of this scale.For a DETAILED insight, this scale comes with a lot of useful and handy features such as overload indicator, auto off, low battery indicator, ERROR INDICATOR, etc.Auto Off is an important feature that helps prevent wastage of batteries. This feature TURNS OFF the scale automatically when it is left idle for more than 2 minutes. This scale runs on 2 AAA batteries (which are provided by the brand) and has a low battery indicator also, which allows the user to replace the batteries before the scale shuts down.It also has a SEPARATE SETTING for measuring milk and water (different icons lights up for respective setting); comes with 1-year warranty which can be extended for 1 more year for free if you review the product on Amazon and register the product on their website (explained in detailed in the included brochure); shows 'Err' on the LCD display (abbreviated for Error) when the maximum measuring capacity of the machine is exceeded. This is a VERY USEFUL FEATURE as one can remove the items being measured and not damage the machine's sensors.Due to its COMPACT size, you can use this scale anywhere you wish to, be it your kitchen, at any camping site, at gym, etc. The scale COMES WITH a detachable transparent measuring bowl included in the bundle which can be used for measuring both dry and wet ingredients with ease. The quality of the bowl is good and is very practical to use because of its appropriate shape and size.You get a PROPER MANUAL in the box which explains each and every feature of this machine, in depth, if you are interested. Moreover, you get a THERMOMETER FREE with this which is really a nice gesture by the brand. I had tested the thermometer and it works perfectly fine (it has its own features like measuring in degree Celsius or Fahrenheit).To show how precise the scale is, I took a pen and placed it at three VERY DIFFERENT places on the scale and in different arrangement but the scale ACCURATELY displayed the exact same measurement in all the three cases (shown in the included video).Overall, I am VERY HAPPY with my purchase of this product. I bought it after THOROUGHLY RESEARCHING and considering the quality, features, price and warranty of the other options available. I have also made a video demonstrating about the features of the scale, a TEST OF ITS PRECISION and my EXPIRIENCE using it. Thanks a lot for reading my review. It feels good when someone gets helped by your work, knowingly or unknowingly!

Show More
Top Review:
This is going to be a two part review of installation and product care.UV + UF filter does not require water out arrangement, hence the installation is simple and most days Eureka Forbes will send a plumber not a "technician".Below are my notes from installation process skipped by the "Technician"Make sure to test TDS before and after installation, this step must not be skipped as the units equipped with MTDS (taste adjuster) have TDS regulator.Steps to adjust TDS:TDS modulator is located inside the product. As per factory setting, it comes in fully closed mode. TDS level of output water can be increased by slowly loosening the spindle of the TDS modulator (anticlockwise). Normally a slight quarter turn is enough to increase the TDS of the output water. Rotating the spindle in the clockwise direction closes the TDS modulator and reduces the level of TDS blending.Please note that the TDS blending, and its adjustment is dependent upon the level of TDS of input water and on the TDS reduction capacity of the RO membrane. TDS adjustment should be done by the authorized Eureka Forbes technician only.Prepping the filter for first use. Almost all the technicians will skip this step as it takes around 45mins to complete, this is a must do!My Eureka forbes authorised installer did not carry out these steps, he was not even aware of it.1. Drain the tank completely.2. Switch OFF the water purifier from the main power supply.3. Open the top cover, wipe the inside of the tank with a dry, clean soft cloth.4. Keep the top cover in place.5. Switch the power supply ON.6. Let the storage tank gets filled and then drop one Disinfection Tablet* (provided in the box) into the tank.Caution: Keep the Disinfection Tablets out of the reach of children. Do not eat/consume the tablet.7. Keep the top cover in place and leave the unit for 30 minutes.8. After 30 minutes, open the tap and discard this and the first filling water completely. Caution: Do not drink this water.9. Now your unit is ready to use. In case you notice any medicinal taste/smell, discard the tank of water fully & let it refill again.NOTE:Please ensure that this disinfection process is carried out during first installation and in every subsequent mandatory servicing of the product.PREFILTER1. If the input water iron content is more than that prescribed in the technical specifications, use of an iron remover** is recommended as a pre- treatment.2. If the input water turbidity is more than that prescribed in the technical specifications or comprises colloidal particles, use of a special filter** is required as a pre-filter.3. If the input water TDS is more than 1,000 ppm (mg/L) or input water hardness is more than 300 ppm (mg/L), use of a Membrane life enhancer** is recommended (applicable only for RO variants).Other than this the product is nice, I like the fact that the storage tank is see through as I can see if the moulds ever develop or if I need to clean it.

Product Name: atomberg Renesa+ 1200mm BLDC Motor 5 Star Rated Sleek Ceiling Fans with Remote Control | High Air Delivery Fan and LED Indicators | Upto 65% Energy Saving | 2+1 Year Warranty (Oak Wood)
About: About this item    ENERGY EFFICIENT BLDC TECHNOLOGY: Atomberg Renesa+ comes with an energy efficient BLDC motor. This 5-star rated fan provides a superior air delivery of 235 CMM with 360 RPM while consuming only 28W (at speed 5), saving up to 65% in electricity consumption.    ADDED CONVENIENCE OF REMOTE: Atomberg Renesa+ fan comes with a Smart IR Remote. IR remotes are easy to use without the hassle of pairing. Adjust the fan's speed or activate its unique features like boost mode, timer, or sleep mode at the click of a button.    SLEEK & UNIQUE DESIGN: Atomberg Renesa+ has a sleek and modern design with LED lights that elevates the décor of your room.    BLADE FINISH: Wooden finish    2+1 YEAR WARRANTY: Atomberg Renesa+ ceiling fan comes with a standard two-year warranty. An additional one-year warranty can be availed of by registering your purchase on the Atomberg website.    CONSISTENT SPEED EVEN AT LOW VOLTAGE: Atomberg Renesa+ ceiling fan runs with no drop in speed during voltage fluctuations ranging between 165V-285V, thereby maintaining consistency. It runs 3X longer on an inverter battery when compared to ordinary fans, allowing you to enjoy consistent airflow even during power outages.    EASY TO CLEAN AND MAINTAIN: Atomberg Renesa+ has blades that are easy to clean and corrosion resistant.
Top Review:
Final update:I give up, only thing left out of this experience was the cost involved in fixing and removing over and over again. The clicking noise doesn't go away no matter what I try. Atombergs website says injecting quick glue is an option, but I think it'll damage the paint for sure. Was looking forward to this fan, sigh. Sour experience, hoping atomberg tightens up their quality control soon. :(In the end, I returned the product. Maybe I'll try their products again in the future. This fan had so much potential, if only those pesky issues were sorted out.Paint- extremely thin, maybe weight savings? But isn't durable that's for sure.Noise- annoying clicking noise..sigh I really wanted a silent fanUpdate 2:Day 1 of the replacement fan, thought it would be good atleast THIS time. Speed 5 has the same issue of noise. Vibration noise when shifting from speed 4 to 6. Wobbles alot. Will try to refit again and update the review.Update 1:The clicking noise kept getting worse. The atomberg service personnel came and checked and deemed it to have a manufacturing defect, opted out of changing parts alone since the fan is brand new and ordered a replacement through amazon.Few shocking facts that I realised after getting the replacement . The body of the fan had vibration dampers near the blade mounting regions (pictures attached) my old fan didn't have them.QC sticker on this one which my old fan didn't have.Removable wrapper on the face of the fan to prevent scratches which my old fan didn't have during unboxing.The blades were covered in the box too.Not sure if I got a used fan before. The new ones unboxing experience seemed much better.Installed the new one today, the wobble seems a bit higher than before.Will wait for a week before I decide.First time replacing a product on amazon, never had these problems before.Let's be honest here,It's an expensive fan alright, 3.8k is alot for a fan but considering the technological benefits, does it even out? Yes. Is the quality there? Not quite there to be honest. Well, let's split the benefits from the setbacks according to meBenefits:1) 35W max for the highest speed (speed 6 or boost mode). 50 % cost savings at the highest speeds when compared to conventional fans, 28W at speed 5 and it keeps reducing to 3 or 5W( not sure exactly but it's very less) I guess for speed 1. 💰 Money saving benefits - Key selling point of the fan2) It's quite fast on boost mode, very airy.3) the led acts as a night lamp, so one more electrical benefit here. (Wish it could have a brightness control, super bright when viewed head on at nights). Nice ambient lighting on the floor though.4) Timer and sleep mode? Naaah, more like a fancy thing. But the feel good factor knowing it's there? Yes.5) Wind noise is there aplenty, but there's no motor noise to speak of.6)Tiny cute little remote that works pretty well, no need to point exactly at the fan, just direct the remote up, press the button and it works.7) the switch on your board itself can be used to turn on the fan and set it's speeds incase you misplace the remote. Press once wait for the led lights to complete a rotation and then turn off and on once for speed 1, twice for 2 and so on till 6(boost).8) It switches on to the last set speed in case you toggle it from the switch board itself.Now coming to my most favourite feature of this fan of them all,9) Incase of a power failure, you don't need to turn on the fan again using the remote like in the case of orient ecotech and oceco fans etc. It automatically turns on to last set speed provided the switch on the switch board is still in the on position. Quite useful for those 5 mins power cuts at night, glad to know it can still act like a normal fan at such instances unlike other brands.10) You can see the DC coil through the translucent cover for the LED's, uber cool touch right there.Now coming to the negatives,1) Quality issues aplenty, My fan had paint peel on a few areas on the wings. Ignored since no one could notice it from a distance, say from the roof.2) The canopies had rough burr edges on the right rod merging areas. Had to shave them off with a knife before pushing the rod through it.3) Wish the serial number could be engraved onto a steel or aluminium plaque instead of just a sticker.Now coming to the biggest grouse,4) My biggest grouse of this fan is the annoying clicking noise at speed 5, rarely happens at 4 , super silent at other speeds. I tried to tighten every single bolt but and screw out there ...but it just happens, sticking to speed 6 or 4 for now. Will contact service if it gets any worse, don't want to go through the hassle just yet since it's the only fan in our bedroom.5) Wobbles a bit too because of it's light weight (not exactly a negative, just adding the details in).Overall,It's just a fan in the end, hoping it stays reliable atleast till the money benefit returns kick in.BLDC in ceiling fans is still relatively new tech, so you have to completely rely on atomberg service team. Don't know what issues I'll face after 3 years. Let's just hope for the best.Overall, an okay buy. Not extremely happy or sad about it. Nothing to rave about either. Hopefully it pays back well when it comes to electricity savings.Have a great day people, sorry about the long review, just wanted to share all my honest thoughts.
Read more
